website_summaries.verdict: This homeopathic formulation provides temporary relief from symptoms and can be used as often as needed.
pros: Uses natural active ingredients to stimulate body's defenses against pink eye
Provides temporary relief from itching, burning, stinging, and other symptoms
Helps with pink eye, dry eye, and histamine reactions
cons: Manufacturer advises to discard any unused portion after 30 days
Homeopathic products may not work for all people

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, Effective And High Quality
customer_reviews.text: My sensitive , dry eyes would be lost without this excellent product which I use several times a day every day. Not safe for use with contact lenses. Not intended to diagnose, and you need to be very careful with BACTERIA and your eyes because prolonged infection can be dangerous, but I was able to fully heal pink eye in about 7-10 days with the liberal use of this product and Solaray’s SP-23 (amazing eye formula) and Vit C. But I used muscle testing to determine how much I needed each day—2-3 times per day.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: If you do not want your pink eye to develop into a stye, go for this
customer_reviews.text: My sister and a friend develop pink eye about the same time. My friend got this and he didn't develop a stye. My sister didn't have this and had a stye after which, she has to get a surgery done to remove the stye. Better go for this than to go for a complicated and expensive operation. Significant improvement after 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Ng Wan Ying

customer_reviews.title: These work!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing non-RX for irritated eyes and pink eye symptoms. Used to use RX drops if I felt pink eye coming on. On a business trip and didn’t have my RX drops and woke up with pink eye. My homeopathic sister suggested Similisan drops. Tried them and symptoms gone overnight. I am beyond thrilled! Have used them several times when I feel pink eye coming on. Works every time! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son had an infection in his eye. He’s a football player so by the time I know something is wrong... SOMETHING IS WRONG! It wasn’t pink eye, but his eye was definitely infected. I searched the web for what I thought might work. I ordered this and then went to the store to buy so I could use immediately. His eye was better the very next day and what I paid for one in the store, I was able to get two for on Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works without stinging
customer_reviews.text: I used visine lr for years until it was discontinued. I bought about 15 other brands trying to find anything remotely close to a oxymetazoline eye drop most sting and burn and do not do very much for the redness this is not as good as visine lr but it seems to be about the closest I have found . Since buying this I also discovered lumify it also works well but it is double the price.
customer_reviews.author: ginaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very easy on the eyes.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for dry eyes not pinkeye & it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy eyes
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. The ingredients knock out intruders that would cause infection and/or irritation, but are so gentle and soothing. I use this for myself, kids, pets. At the start of any goobers, itching, or irritation, I use this and eyes are happy again. I will never go back to the "big name" eye drops. These are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Hall

customer_reviews.title: these got me through the fires
customer_reviews.text: The smoke from the recent fires was very irritating to my eyes. These drops were very soothing and I feel sure they washed any soot out of my eyes and stopped the burning feeling from the smoke.
customer_reviews.author: GAM

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Works and better than what I got from the doctor.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Texas Girl

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR EVERYONE
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were very positive & I wanted this to work. I followed instructions & within minutes the skin on eyelids puffed up & also below eye. Looked like I was hit. Skin full of liquid & it burned, 1 week later still looks bad. Went to Dr & he said I had an allergic reaction. I hope it works for you all. Package great, arrived on time Amazon amazing on return/refund. My eyes didn't fare too well. Hope this helps. Barbara R.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Ruotolo

customer_reviews.title: This product was effective for me.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a surprise, the irritation in my eyes cleared up when I used this product! I thought I would have to see a doctor, but not after using these drops for a few days. The redness cleared up and did not return. I was glad I purchased the 2 pack. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: IslandGirl

customer_reviews.title: Good product, works as described
customer_reviews.text: My husband got pink eye and is absolutely miserable. Got these until we can get him into a Dr she he said they work great to relieve the itching and scratchiness

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: These eyedrops are very soothing. Drops come in a little glass bottle with dropper top. Very easy to use with one hand!

customer_reviews.title: I want my color I Fading 👀
customer_reviews.text: You guys are killing me hair color is not a option to drop but I actually get it your under pressure too. Hurry up,😊

customer_reviews.title: package empty
customer_reviews.text: I received the package from amazon, however, the package was empty. there was nothing inside. I did not open the package. no-one stole what was inside as you can tell it was sealed empty. it was light so I held the package up to light and you can tell it has no drops in it.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I don't believe these drops helped with my pinkeye at all. No relief whatsoever. Cannot recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Nice glass bottle
customer_reviews.text: Bottle cap just turn counter-clockwise to open. Comes out easily, without squeezing. Nice solid glass container. Seems to work for me.

customer_reviews.title: Took longer than expected
customer_reviews.text: The medicine took longer than expected to work but still had to go to the Drs.

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best way to get rid of red sore eyes and pink eye...Works way better than the well known V company brand and makes your eyes feel cool and soothed...Even give our rabbits a dose and cleared up their problems too! Thank you for a product that works!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a child with pink eye. Avoided going to the Dr office. Within seconds of putting it in the eye, itchiness was better. Very quickly the discharge reduced. Pink eye totally healed in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: W. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Helps me a LOT
customer_reviews.text: As someone with chronic sinus issues, I find these drops help me So much. Not sure they'd cure pink eye but they sure do prevent it for me. I often get pink eye when I get one of my chronic sinus infections. This product, used 3 times a day, prevents that from happening. It feels Good in my eyes (no burning, no stinging). It's not as moisturizing as Systane, but whatever ingredient is in this, it prevents pink eye for me. love this stuff! Keeps my eyes healthier.
customer_reviews.author: lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Great product until you can get to the dr
customer_reviews.text: I have dry eye BAD this product I wouldn’t be able to use solo but to get me to the dr for a prescription wow did it work really well. And it’s holistic. I’m amazed at the newer holistic products coming out that really seem to work for me. This is one of them and if your dry eye isn’t that bad it might actually be all you need. I just happen to have a bad case of dry eye. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Eden Perfidio

customer_reviews.title: They worked!
customer_reviews.text: They work! I was suffering from bad allergic pink eye (bad tree pollen year) and has tons of watering, mucous coating my corneas and itching like crazy. These drops really helped!

product_meta.title: Similasan Pink Eye Relief Drops 0.33 fl oz 2 Count, for Temporary Relief from Red Eyes, Itchy Eyes, Burning Eyes, and Watery Eyes, Formulated with Natural Active Ingredients
product_meta.description: When your family members get pink eye, give them gentle relief with Pink Eye Relief. Similasan eye drops stimulate your body's natural ability to temporarily relieve symptoms without potentially irritating ingredients. Many other eye drops have vasoconstrictors that may actually worsen the symptoms of bloodshot eyes if used more than directed. With Similasan you can feel good about helping your family feel better without the use of harsh chemicals. Can be used with contact lenses. Drops will not damage lenses but performance might be better when applied without lenses. If you have redness, itchiness or irritation, it is best to avoid lenses for a while. Trusted by pharmacists and families in Switzerland for 40 years, Similasan is a leading Swiss brand of remedies that use natural active ingredients instead of harsh chemicals to keep families healthy. Our state of the art facility located near the Swiss Alps makes over 190 popular remedies for children and adults. Claims based on traditional homeopathic practice, not accepted medical evidence. Not FDA evaluated.
feature_bullets: Similasan Pink Eye Relief drops provide temporary relief from pink eye symptoms like redness, burning, watering, irritation, and grittiness. Use as often as needed with no known side effects.
Similasan Pink Eye Relief eye drops stimulate the body's natural defenses instead of masking pink eye symptoms like red eyes, burning eyes, watery eyes, irritated eyes, and gritty eyes.
Similasan homeopathic eye drops are made with natural active ingredients like eyebright, not harsh chemicals. Similasan eye drops do not contain vasoconstrictors: chemicals that cause rebound effect.
For over 40 years, Similasan has been used by pharmacists and families in Switzerland. Similasan is a leading brand of homeopathic remedies with natural active ingredients to keep families healthy.
Similasan is a Swiss brand dedicated to helping families feel good about feeling better. Our gentle eye drops provide natural temporary relief from pink eye symptoms.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
